snippet: The novelist John Green and his brother, Hank, have built a fandom based on a YouTube channel and books aimed at teenagers.
abstract: Novelist John Green and his brother Hank, who have built teenage fan base through their YouTube channel VlogBrothers, host show at Carnegie Hall to celebrate one-year anniversary of his 2012 book The Fault in Our Stars.
lead_paragraph: The novelist John Green and his brother, Hank, have built a fandom based on a YouTube channel and books aimed at teenagers.

headline.seo: John and Hank Green Bring Their Show to Carnegie Hall
headline.main: A Novelist and His Brother Sell Out Carnegie Hall
headline.print_headline: A Novelist and His Brother Sell Out Carnegie Hall
